require:
function checkrequirements(uj)
        if uj.storage['roomsdc_r'] and uj.storage['roomsdc_sr'] and uj.storage['roomsdc_sr'] then
          return true
        else
          return false
        end
      end

function checkrequirements(uj)
        local result = false
        for i,v in ipairs(uj.storage) do
          if v >= 10 then
            result = true
          end
        end
        return result
        
      end
